name: Sadhana
briefDescription: Sadhana a non- profit making social service organization constituted by a group of young activists with considerable experience working in community development programmes who visualized the problems thrown of by inexorable march of Super Cyclone on 29th October 1999. It started its journey in 2000 and got registered under S.R Act 1860, FCRA-1976, u/s 12A and 80G of Income Tax Act 1961.  To achieve the vision and mission of the organization undertake various need-based projects in partnership with various agencies and Government of India. Earlier we had opportunities to work with DAN TB, District TB Cell, Ministry of Culture, and National Commission for Women, Ministry of Forest and Environment, Ministry of Sports and Youth Affairs, CBR in connection with various programmes; Sadhanaâ€™s works emphasizing community development, health and hygiene, cultural diversity, institutional development. With dedicated staffs and change makers Sadhana bringing awareness on health exchange through Sadhana Health Village activities.
